## World Trade Organization (WTO)

Most countries are part of the [World Trade Organization]{.hp} and adhere to a default non-discriminatory ["Most Favored Nations" (MFN)]{.hi} tariff rate schedule that applies to each country they trade with

::: {.fragment}
An exception to this is the use of [Regional Trade Agreements]{.hp} which apply updated (reduced) tariffs to the set of parties included in an agreement

::: {.incremental}
- Free Trade Agreements
- Preferential Trade Agreements
- Custom Unions
:::

:::
